item.title: Loose drain cover on the road, 18th February
item.description:
It's on the road right next to the curb, on the corner of London Road and Sandford Mill Road, on the left as if you're heading towards town centre. Slowly getting louder over the last few weeks due to the huge amount of traffic turning down Sandford Mill Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, King Henry Close, Cheltenham
